text: I'm in New York City for the 10th time
in the last half decades I love this
city in and out but it's just so dang
expensive it is true that this city has
everything you could ever want Broadway
shows baseball games every kind of
restaurant every type of person
skyscrapers dive bars nightclubs but it
all comes at a very steep price for
tourists like myself and every local
living here like my friend Brian I paid
$10,000 a month and I don't even earn a
single point if you live in New York
City and you're striving to be in the
top 1% of all residents your salary must
be six hundred and eight thousand five
hundred and eighty four dollars just
took a 10-minute Wilbur ride from
midtown to the Upper East Side for $22
even the subway is 275 variety more
expensive than any other metro I've seen
what about hotels this small room is
costing us 250 bucks a night but if you
think that's expensive wait until you
eat with the exception of dollar sized
pizzas and dumplings food in the Big
Apple is insanely expensive the other
day I went to Koreatown for some
barbecue and spent 85 bucks
on one serving of beef and one bottle of
soju in Seoul that'd be about $12 to get
brunch which seems to be the trend these
days you're looking at about 30 bucks
including tip and don't bother going to
the grocery store to save much because
groceries in New York City are about 35%
higher than the national average shall
we talk booze you're lucky to get a
decent cocktail under 12 buck usually
closer to 20
for a comparison you can get 40 beers in
Hanoi for $20 today in New York City I
spent a hundred and seven dollars and
what did I buy lunch at a Filipino
restaurant dinner at a Japanese
restaurant and three short uber rides if
I had the same day in Manila I'd spent
about 20 bucks so now you can probably
understand why it's a no-brainer that
I've decided to live in Southeast Asia
for the last few years I can get the
same quality of life food and I'm
surrounded with nicer people for
one-fifth the price I'm drew pinsky and
if you like my travel videos please
click Subscribe and join me as I plan to
visit every country in the world
